name: Prescriber Id
description: This variable contains the prescriber identification number as reported by the Part D sponsor on the PDE record submitted to CMS.

additional: eob.careTeam[N].provider.display = {corresponding description from valueset specified in .system}
fhirMapping.note: This eob.careTeam element will only be supplied if the Prescriber Id is populated and the Prescriber Id Qualifier Code = '01'  The eob.careTeam[N].sequence will be stored in the eob.item[N].careTeamLinkId list for every single item.
